text: @GavinNewsom Traitor! 1 billion to China for N95 masks at $5 a mask! We just got a quote for a low qty at $5 a mask in US! Boycot California, no Coronavirus bailout for Calif, our tax dollars shouldn't go to the country/CCP that purposely unleashed this pandemic, murdered us, destroyed lives!
